verbose_text: The results of the present study suggested that the miR-9-5p / Klf4 axis had an inhibitory effect on the apoptotic protein, Bax, and served to activate the anti-apoptotic protein, Bcl-2, by targeting the AKT pathway.
evidence: Klf4 axis had an inhibitory effect on the apoptotic protein, Bax, and served to activate the anti-apoptotic protein, Bcl-2
